MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY12  postcode area of Dumfermline. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am to safely carry out repairs to a faulty electrical equipment at Rintoul avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:51am on Wednesday, 25 November 2020
